intro.description: You may already have some tables of Test Items in a spreadsheet. This Cheat Sheet explains how to copy this data and paste it into a Language Module.

item.title: Create or Open a Test Module
item.description: Create a New Module in the normal way (File->New Language Module)or open an existing one.

item.title: Copy and Paste the data into a column
item.description: Open the spreadsheet containing the data.

subitem.label: Select a column of data in your spreadsheet representing the data in your own language.

Select the Test Items that you want to paste the data into. Use Ctrl+Click to select multiple items, Shift+Click to select a range. Make sure that the number of rows selected matches the number of rows that you copied from the spreadsheet.
Right Click in the Test Items Table of the Test Module Editor. Choose Paste Into->Column, where column is the appropriate column name.
Repeat this process for each column that you want to copy and save the results with File->Save.
